mapper.select: SELECT uuid, member_role AS role, name, rrn, phone, create_date, update_date, delete_date FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE uuid=#{uuid}
SELECT uuid, name FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE member_role = 'R002'
SELECT uuid, name, member_role AS role FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE uuid != #{uuid} AND ( member_role = 'R002' OR member_role = 'R003' )
SELECT uuid, name, rrn, phone, create_date FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE member_role = 'R004' AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER (uuid, member_role, name, rrn, phone) VALUES (#{uuid}, 'R004', #{name}, #{rrn}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT id as userid, name, phone, c.create_date as register_date FROM ( SELECT uuid, name, phone FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE uuid = #{uuid} ) as m JOIN TB_MEMBER_CREDENTIALS AS c ON m.uuid = c.user_uuid
